alert.note: Alert for Converse; Niobrara; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 7:15PM MDT until September 09 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN NIOBRARA...NORTHWESTERN PLATTE AND EAST CENTRAL CONVERSE COUNTIES... At 714 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Glendo, or 16 miles southeast of Douglas, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Glendo around 725 PM MDT. Glendo Reservoir and Two Moon Campground around 735 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 99 and 126. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
